title: Dayforce PayAdjustments
description: JSON schema for sending PayAdjustments data to Dayforce via API integration.

EmployeePayAdjustXRefCode.description: External reference code identifying the Pay Adjustment record.

OrgUnitXRefCode.description: External reference code of the organization unit associated with the pay adjustment.

EmployeeXRefCode.description: External reference code of the employee the pay adjustment applies to.

PayAdjustmentCodeXRefCode.description: External reference code defining the pay adjustment type (e.g., LOA_ICI).

PayAdjustmentDate.description: The effective date and time for the pay adjustment.

Hours.description: Number of hours applied to the adjustment.

Amount.description: Monetary amount associated with the pay adjustment.

JobXRefCode.description: External reference code of the job, if applicable.

DepartmentXRefCode.description: External reference code of the department, if applicable.

PayCategoryXRefCode.description: External reference code for the pay category.

ProjectXRefCode.description: External reference code for the related project, if applicable.

DocketXRefCode.description: External reference code for the docket, if applicable.

PieceQuantity.description: Piece quantity associated with the pay adjustment, if applicable.

IsPremium.description: Indicates whether the adjustment is premium pay.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the pay adjustment record should be marked as deleted.

PayDate.description: Date when the pay is scheduled or issued.

ReferenceDate.description: Reference date for the pay adjustment.

EmployeeComment.description: Comment provided by the employee regarding the adjustment.

ManagerAuthorized.description: Indicates if the manager has authorized this pay adjustment.

EmployeeAuthorized.description: Indicates if the employee has authorized this pay adjustment.

AdjustPeriodStartDate.description: Start date and time of the pay adjustment period.

AdjustPeriodEndDate.description: End date and time of the pay adjustment period.
